title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.50 - Public water supply protection; performance standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.50 - Public water supply protection; performance standards

State Regulations

The local health department shall maintain a program that ensures public water systems are operated pursuant to the New York State Public Health Law, Part 5 of the State Sanitary Code (10 NYCRR Part
5
), and applicable federal Safe Drinking Water Act (SDWA) requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
40-2.50

Amended, New

York State Register December 31, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
